## Reading the Data
```{r}
education <- read.table("Exercise 1/Education.txt", header=T)
```
## Exercise 1: Plotting
Yes you can change all the Labels on a graph with plot by adding `main`, `ylab` and `xlab` parameters.
```{r}
plot(education$Education, education$Wage, xlab="Education in Years", ylab="Wage per Year", main="Education vs Wage", xlim=c(0, max(education$Education)))
```
